nodes.text: Kreegan Ramar was a male Mandalorian mercenary living during the Cold War and Galactic War. He and his henchmen were terrorizing the Jawa Meerko Clan on Tatooine, which caused Meerko to use the Bounty Brokers Association to place a bounty on his head.
He wore gray and red Mandalorian Seeker armor.
Kreegan Ramar was a tall male muscular humanoid.

Unlike his fellow Mandalorians, Kreegan showed many dishonorable traits that was unfitting of an Mandalorian. He enjoyed terrorizing the Meerko Clan, raiding and stealing much of their belongings, he gave Mandalorians a bad name to their reputation though he claimed be a mercenary for life and that he had limits to jobs he'll take. Despite his dishonorable traits and actions, he showed no fear of death as any other Mandalorian, believing he would go out fighting.
Kreegan Ramar first appeared in game update 2.3 of the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2013. He is only accessible through the Bounty Contract Week event.
